overview: A young leopard named Leo 80 M, an inhabitant of the Ussuri taiga, arrogant, confident in his strength and agility falls into a poaching trap. He, exhausted and emaciated, is found by Russian border guards and called for the help of naturalist scientists from the Land of the Leopard Nature Park. The leopard has a badly damaged paw. Scientists are fighting for his life. This newcomer, who found himself in trouble, had never before caught the eye and in the camera traps of specialists. Leo 80M is a unique specimen. The absence of phalanges on his paw makes him helpless in the struggle for life in the wild. Will the leopard return to its land?
title: Leo 80. The Story of a Leopard
